WARNING.impact: Titles may be truncated in SERPs, reducing CTR
WARNING.recommendation: Shorten titles to 55-60 characters while keeping primary keyword at start

WARNING.impact: Description may be truncated in SERPs
May slow initial paint, affects FCP
WARNING.recommendation: Consider inlining critical CSS or using preload/async
Add descriptive title attributes to key images

WARNING.impact: May be seen as thin content by search engines
WARNING.recommendation: Add more visible text content or FAQ section

WARNING.description: Static assets not using efficient cache policy
WARNING.impact: Repeat visits may be slower than necessary
WARNING.recommendation: Set longer cache TTL for static assets (images, fonts, CSS/JS)

WARNING.impact: Increases page load time and bandwidth usage
WARNING.recommendation: Use PurgeCSS or similar to remove unused styles

WARNING.description: Legacy JavaScript being served to modern browsers
WARNING.recommendation: Use differential serving or modern build targets

INFO.description: DOM has nodes with more than 60 children
INFO.recommendation: Consider lazy loading or virtualization for long lists

INFO.description: Meta keywords don't fully match content
INFO.impact: Minor - meta keywords ignored by Google
INFO.recommendation: Update meta keywords or remove if not needed
Consider using rel='noopener' and reviewing link necessity
